      • shouldBlockDrop

        boolean shouldBlockDrop(MapGUI me,
                      org.bukkit.entity.Player who)
        This is called right before the MapGUI disposes. Hook this event to prevent the MapGUI from being dropped.
        Parameters:
        me - the MapGui tha will maybe dropped
        who - the player who caused this event, or null if it was caused because of other reasons
        Returns:
        true if the drop should be cancelled, false otherwise
